A Song<S>7892</S> of degrees<S>4609</S> of David<S>1732</S>. I was glad<S>8055</S> when they said<S>559</S> unto me, Let us go<S>3212</S> into the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Our feet<S>7272</S> shall stand<S>5975</S> within thy gates<S>8179</S>, O Jerusalem<S>3389</S>.
Jerusalem<S>3389</S> is builded<S>1129</S> as a city<S>5892</S> that is compact<S>2266</S> together<S>3162</S>:
Whither<S>8033</S> the tribes<S>7626</S> go up<S>5927</S>, the tribes<S>7626</S> of the LORD<S>3050</S>, unto the testimony<S>5715</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, to give thanks<S>3034</S> unto the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>.
For there are set<S>3427</S> thrones<S>3678</S> of judgment<S>4941</S>, the thrones<S>3678</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of David<S>1732</S>. <sup>are: Heb. do sit</sup>
Pray<S>7592</S> for the peace<S>7965</S> of Jerusalem<S>3389</S>: they shall prosper<S>7951</S> that love<S>157</S> thee.
Peace<S>7965</S> be within thy walls<S>2426</S>, and prosperity<S>7962</S> within thy palaces<S>759</S>.
For my brethren<S>251</S> and companions'<S>7453</S> sakes, I will now say<S>1696</S>, Peace<S>7965</S> be within thee.
Because of the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> our God<S>430</S> I will seek<S>1245</S> thy good<S>2896</S>.
